climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards. MADE SAFE certifies products made without known toxic chemicals, by prohibiting substances that harm human health or the environment. Soil Association certifies organic products and is a Certification Body for the COSMOS-standard, which ensures products are genuine organic or natural cosmetics. ORGANIC

features: No Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), Parabens or MIT
body.description: Soft and gentle Organic Baby Wipes for daily use on your little one’s delicate skin. We use an organic cotton cloth infused with organic essential oils of chamomile, apricot and sweet almond oil. All of which cleanse and refresh, leaving skin clean and soft. The gentle formula is free from detergents such as sodium lauryl sulphate (SLS) or any of its close relatives. No parabens or synthetic preservatives, including methylisothiazolinone (MIT) and other types of formaldehyde releasing preservatives. Certified by The Soil Association.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For daily use on your baby’s delicate skin Natracare Organic Baby Wipes Soft and gentle organic cotton baby wipes for daily use on your little one’s delicate skin. We use an organic cotton cloth infused with organic essential oils of chamomile, apricot and sweet almond oil. All of which cleanse and refresh, leaving skin clean and soft. Great for camping, traveling, festivals and picnics! Suitable for sensitive skin PH balanced & alcohol free No Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), Parabens or MIT Compostable Certified organic formula & organic cotton cloth*** GMO free ingredients

Ingredients: 100% certified organic cotton cloth*** Aqua, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil (Rapeseed), Glycerin, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-2-dipolyhydroxystearate, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil (Apricot)*, Levulinic Acid, Parfum (Citrus Dulcis Extract (Orange), Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Coriandrum Sativum Fruit Oil (Coriander), Juniperus Virginiana (Red Cedar), Citrus Bergamia Peel Oil Expressed (Bergamot Orange), Citrus Amara (Bitter Orange), Piper Nigrum Oil (Black Pepper)), Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Chloride, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract (Chamomile)*, Maltodextrin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Sweet Almond)*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Sunflower), Potassium Sorbate, Glyceryl Oleate, Dicapryl Carbonate, Sodium Phytate, Limonene**, Linalool** *Organic ingredient **Naturally occurring in the essential oils *** This is a certified organic product. Independent auditing of our manufacturing process to the highest standards, including sourcing of ingredients, processes, and packaging. Licence number : HB00303

Ingredients: 100% certified organic cotton cloth*** Aqua, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil (Rapeseed), Glycerin, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-2-dipolyhydroxystearate, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil (Apricot)*, Levulinic Acid, Parfum (Citrus Dulcis Extract (Orange), Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Coriandrum Sativum Fruit Oil (Coriander), Juniperus Virginiana (Red Cedar), Citrus Bergamia Peel Oil Expressed (Bergamot Orange), Citrus Amara (Bitter Orange), Piper Nigrum Oil (Black Pepper)), Sodium Levulinate, Sodium Chloride, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract (Chamomile)*, Maltodextrin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Sweet Almond)*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Sunflower), Potassium Sorbate, Glyceryl Oleate, Dicapryl Carbonate, Sodium Phytate, Limonene**, Linalool** *Organic ingredient **Naturally occurring in the essential oils *** This is a certified organic product. Independent auditing of our manufacturing process to the highest standards, including sourcing of ingredients, processes, and packaging. Licence number : HB00303

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using these for years. The wipe is strong but soft, the scent is pleasant, and the formula feels moisturizing without any residue. I'm not sure why their "intimate wipes" cost so much more, but I'm happy to stick to these. I have sensitive skin and many wipes feel drying, irritating, or have an unpleasant residue where these feel comfortable to use and non-existant afterwards. And I can't say enough good things about the scent, which is pleasant but not heavy and doesn't hit that "baby wipe" smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only wipe I'd use
reviews.reviewText: No residue. Light pleasant smell. Good, clean ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Non toxic wipes but pricey and thin
reviews.reviewText: This product is very good at keeping baby’s skin without redness and smells good to me. Good ingredients. I specially like that is doesn’t have chlorine or alcohol, and that the wipes are actual cotton.However, the wipes are in the thinner side and I tent to use more because of that, they only come 50 wipes and on top of that they are pricey. Therefore they get 4 stars only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these wipes and I've been using them for years for myself. I know these are shown as diaper wipes but I use them for myself. They're cotton with skin friendly chamomile and sweet almond oil. They don't irritate, they're both soft and strong.

reviews.reviewerName: BEZOS IS RICH BC U DONT RETURN THE CRAP
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE ONLY ONES TO GET!!!
reviews.reviewText: One word: the smell. Well, that’s two. EVERY other brand STINKS like baby lotion mixed with hospital smell. It’s a ruly baffling to me that companies don’t grasp that no one wants to smell like that or THINK about that regarding their most private area, ahem, but these ones smell great. Yes all adults should use these. Why? It’s gross that you don’t. If you got poo on you cheek, would you swipe at it with a dry tissue? I didn’t think so. #convert You’re welcome. xxx

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Our baby was allergic to EVERY SINGLE NATURAL WIPE except this one. It’s expensive, no doubt, but it’s worth it. The wipes are strong and soft, they work well even on tough diaper messes, and the scent is awesome (not floral, not artificial). Best of all, they work well for kiddos who have allergies or get rashes easily. There’s never too little liquid, either. Nor have I had a wipe disintegrate on me. The best wipes around, hands down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the baby, good for the earth!
reviews.reviewText: Love these baby wipes! The scent is subtle but very pleasant. I’ve found that a lot of “natural” baby wipes are still not biodegradable. This is the best option I’ve found for wipes that are good for baby’s skin and good for the environment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, comfortable, soothing
reviews.reviewText: These wipes are gentle enough for sensitive skin, & regular use.
Dejan la piel del bebé muy tirante
Diese Tücher sind klasse. Zum wickeln, wischen, säubern... Am Wickeltisch, in der Wickeltasche und für draußen. Dazu der angenehme Duft und keinerlei Irritationen der Haut oder so.
Super feuchtücherHaben einen sehr angenehmen Duft
